scripts.install-all: cd api && npm install && cd ../ui && npm install && cd .. && npm install
scripts.restart: npm run stop && npm run start
scripts.migrate: cd api && npx knex migrate:rollback && npx knex migrate:latest
scripts.build-all: npm run build-db && npm run build-api && npm run build-ui
scripts.push-all: docker push cykline/upnext-db && docker push cykline/upnext-api && docker push cykline/upnext-ui
scripts.pull-all: docker pull cykline/upnext-db && docker pull cykline/upnext-api && docker pull cykline/upnext-ui
